definition: the corresponding time period (in a different year etc)/concurrent/synchronous
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: Gambling revenues jumped 59% compared to the previous November.
sentences.chinese: 賭博業收入與去年同期相比激增了59%。

sentences.english: Grain prices have pushed up by 15% year-on-year.
sentences.chinese: 糧食價格比去年同期漲了15%。

sentences.english: All sorts of seamless steel tube production and the highest are over.
sentences.chinese: 各種無縫鋼管產銷量均創歷年來的同期最高。

sentences.english: Even C. elegans worms that wiggle slowly die sooner than worms of the same age that wiggle more quickly.
sentences.chinese: 即便是同期蠕蟲，爬得慢的比爬得快的早死。

sentences.english: That pushed inventories 592 billion cubic feet higher than they were at the same time a year ago.
sentences.chinese: 這使得總庫存達到5920億立方米，高於去年同期。

sentences.english: At this time last year, drillers were operating 679 oil rigs.
sentences.chinese: 去年同期，運營鑽井平臺數量爲679。

sentences.english: He returned a year earlier than John.
sentences.chinese: 又回到去年同期比約恩。

sentences.english: Patients with a hydatidiform mole are often large for dates and have hyperemesis gravidarum more frequently.
sentences.chinese: 病人看起來常比同期正常孕婦子宮大，常伴妊娠劇吐。

sentences.english: Over the same period, a number of suburban towns and townships have set up a cinema.
sentences.chinese: 同期，郊縣區一些鄉鎮也建立起電影院。

sentences.english: Was the champion of HK and Singapore box office.
sentences.chinese: 香港和新加坡票房榮登同期港產票房冠軍。

sentences.english: This position will be six-month contract.
sentences.chinese: 此職位合同期爲六個月。

sentences.english: Select the same age-matched healthy subjects as control group of 15 cases.
sentences.chinese: 選取同期年齡匹配的健康體檢者15例作爲對照組。

sentences.english: Clinical results achieved the advanced level in the world, took the lead in Asia.
sentences.chinese: 臨牀移植效果居亞洲領先，達到國際同期領先水平。

sentences.english: Haixi and Yanshan periods are important time for mineralization of gold.
sentences.chinese: 不同構造中的金礦脈是不同期成礦作用的產物。

sentences.english: In the year-ago period, outflows totaled $1.5 billion.
sentences.chinese: 去年同期則是總計流出15億美元。

sentences.english: We are graduates of the same year.

definition: to stay level (of exchange rate, market share etc)/fair/unbiased
to compare/to dispute/compared to/(before adj.) relatively/comparatively/rather/also pr. [jiao3]
